channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole outside 12 Albany Road, 13th March
item.description:
Pothole outside 12 Albany Road, which is big enough to cause cars to swerve around it. There is gravel across the road which also creates a braking hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Albany Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Dagmar Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole on Dagmar Road outside number 4, 13th March
item.description:
Pothole has been getting steadily worse all winter.

item.title: Road surface and marking badly damaged on pedestrian crossing, 13th March
item.description:
Road is in a terrible state all around the pedestrian crossing. The road surface is breaking up, spreading gravel all over the road. This has created a very dangerous situation as cars braking for pedestrians could easily skid and cause an accident. Additionally, the road markings are rapidly disappearing as the road surface further deteriorates and more of the road markings disappear. This has been getting steadily worse all winter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Suffolk Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Deadly, 13th March

item.title: Hope invisible until you hit it, 13th March
item.description:
On the way towards the old bath road. Didn’t realise it was a hole until I’d hit it - massive bang. Hit two or these on one journey home - both front tyres - lucky me! Won’t be surprised if my tyres are flat in the morning. These are the same holes repaired and failed repeatedly. Please get a proper job done on them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Greenhills Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole not visible until you’ve hit it, 13th March
item.description:
Before the roundabout to turn up the hill. Didn’t see it until I hit it - doesn’t look like a massive hole but there was huge bang on my wheel when I hit it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on exit from Ermin street onto roundabout., 13th March
item.description:
Pothole causes severe bang through car tyres/suspension and can be difficult to avoid when joining roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 deep potholes on Hillview Road with jagged edges, 13th March
item.description:
There a 2 deep potholes on Hillview Road close to the junction with Priors Road. I recently reported 3 potholes but only 1 was filled. These 2 were left even though they are equally as bad. They are deep and have jagged edges and are likely to damage car tyres/wheels and will damage bike tyres/wheels.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hill View Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Wessex Drive, Battledown, Cheltenham

item.title: Substantial Subsidence on side of cycle path, 13th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Raised and uneven paving slabs., 13th March
item.description:
I tripped and fell on a raised paving slab on the right hand side pavement coming down Winchcombe Street towards the High Street. This occurred just a few feet up from Expert Eyebrows Salon. It really shook me up and I'm still very bruised and tender all over. Some lovely people came to my aid and one man told me his wife had tripped in the same place a couple of days ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Winchcombe Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
